# Pull Request / 拉取请求

## 变更类型 / Type of Change

请勾选适用的选项：
Please check the applicable options:

- [ ] Bug 修复（不会破坏现有功能的修复）
  Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] 新功能（不会破坏现有功能的新功能）
  New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] 破坏性变更（修复或功能会导致现有功能无法按预期工作）
  Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] 文档更新
  Documentation update
- [ ] 代码重构
  Code refactoring
- [ ] 性能优化
  Performance improvement
- [ ] 其他（请描述）
  Other (please describe)

## 变更描述 / Description

请清晰描述此 PR 的变更内容：
Please clearly describe the changes in this PR:

## 相关 Issue / Related Issue

如果此 PR 解决了某个 issue，请在此引用：
If this PR resolves an issue, please reference it here:

关闭 / Closes #(issue number)

## 变更清单 / Checklist

请确认以下事项：
Please confirm the following:

- [ ] 我的代码遵循项目的代码风格
  My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] 我已经进行了自我审查
  I have performed a self-review
- [ ] 我已经注释了我的代码，特别是在难以理解的区域
  I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] 我已经更新了相关文档
  I have updated the relevant documentation
- [ ] 我的更改不会产生新的警告
  My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] 我已经添加了测试来证明我的修复是有效的或我的功能有效
  I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] 新的和现有的单元测试都能在我的更改下通过
  New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] 任何依赖的更改都已合并并发布
  Any dependent changes have been merged and published

## 测试说明 / Testing

请描述您如何测试这些更改：
Please describe how you tested these changes:

## 截图 / Screenshots

如果适用，请添加截图：
If applicable, please add screenshots:

## 附加说明 / Additional Notes

任何其他需要说明的信息：
Any other information that needs to be explained:
